name: airtrail
description: AirTrail is a personalized flight logbook app for pilots. It allows storing flight entries, tracking totals and hours, and visualizing flight activity. It also includes privacy-first self-hosting features and import/export options.
features: Flight Logging: Store detailed flight entries with comprehensive data tracking. Your complete aviation history.
Hours Tracking: Automatically calculate and track total flight hours and time. Stay current with requirements.
Activity Visualization: View flight patterns and statistics through visual dashboards. Understand your flying habits.
Privacy-First: Self-hosted solution keeps your flight data completely private. Your logbook, your control.
Import/Export: Easily transfer data between systems and backup your records. Never lose your flight history.
Pilot-Focused: Designed specifically for pilots with aviation-specific features. Built by pilots, for pilots.
Multi-Aircraft: Track flights across different aircraft types and registrations. Manage your entire fleet.
Regulatory Compliance: Maintain records that meet aviation authority requirements. Stay audit-ready.
